content: Hiring a long term community managerLooking for 1 person in Asia daytime (0000 - 0800 GMT)Responsibilities:- Be knowledgable about the project (we will train you)- Answer questions from community members quickly- Be attentive- Know how to interact with community members to make them feel welcome- Remove spam and scammers- Take content that we give you and modify it so its appropriate for posting in TelegramRequirements:- Excellent English- Sociable, good attitude- Stable internet- Work everydayGood Attributes- Previous experience as a community manager or customer support representative- Actively participating in the crypto communityWorking Relationship:- Payments weekly (not shitcoins)- Long term, everydayTo apply, join our company discord and open a job application ticket. In the ticket, please state the following and wait for a reply from the team:- Your timezone, and if you are able to work the shift 00:00 - 08:00 GMT- Previous experience- Any other obligations you have- Experience in crypto- Your desired monthly salary*Do not spam tag us in your ticket - we see and evaluate all incoming applications
